Fortunately, Ferriss has a readymade response to the haters: they show he's right. Doing anything remotely interesting will bring criticism, he says in a blogpost, The Benefits Of Pissing People Off, quoting Colin Powell .`` Pissing people off is both inevitable and necessary.'' legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying.`` We certainly want to avoid that,'' Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. I think it is in our interests and I would hope in their interests to a do a quick analysis of concerns that have been raised by competitors, hopefully they are minor or they are not correct.`` We'll find out and make sure we are operating well within the law and the spirit of the law. Brussels launched a formal investigation into Google Inc. in November following complaints from European rivals that it was abusing its dominant position in the market for web search services. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
